articles.author: Peter Beaumont
articles.title: Omicron Covid variant ‘present in Europe at least 10 days ago’ - The Guardian
articles.description: Two cases of new Covid variant found in Netherlands predate last week’s alert from South Africa
articles.content:
The Omicron variant of Covid-19 was present in Europe at least 10 days ago and already appears to be spreading in the Netherlands and elsewhere.
We have found the Omicron coronavirus variant in two … [+5344 chars]

articles.title: Very Large Telescope uncovers closest pair of supermassive black holes yet - Phys.Org
articles.description: Using the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope (ESO's VLT), astronomers have revealed the closest pair of supermassive black holes to Earth ever observed. The two objects also have a much smaller separation than any other previously spotted pa…

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Rise in German Covid-19 infections flattens - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: BERLIN: Germany reported another 45,753 new coronavirus cases and 388 deaths on Tuesday, but the seven-day incidence of cases per 100,000 people fell .
articles.content: Rise in German Covid-19 infections flattens
